trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Deklaruje uprawnienia podczas ładowania typów z zestawów, które są używane przez XAML odczytywania lub zapisywania.

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: XamlLoadPermission ma zastosowanie w przypadku scenariuszy, takich jak czy wewnętrzne typy są dozwolone można załadować w częściowej relacji zaufania.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> przy użyciu wyliczalny zestaw określonych <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje połączenie do tego konstruktora <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kolekcji z poszczególnymi `allowedAccess` wpis jako element i ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>do `false` w utworzone wystąpienie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczalny zestaw określonych <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccesszawiera nieprawidłowe informacje, takie jak elementu o wartości null.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> przy użyciu istniejących uprawnień.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>Ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>do `true` w utworzone wystąpienie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Aby jakiekolwiek odwołania do tego konstruktora ustawia <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kolekcji `null` ponieważ nie jest istotne, jeśli uprawnienia są zgłaszane zamiast <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> wartości wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> przy użyciu pojedynczego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje połączenie do tego konstruktora <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kolekcji z `allowedAccess` jako jedynym elementem i ustawia zwrotu dla <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>do `false` w utworzone wystąpienie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Definiowanie <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera listę wszystkich <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości tego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> reprezentuje.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli bieżący <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>została zainicjowana tak, aby <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>jest `true`, może być AllowedAccess `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lista tylko do odczytu do <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> wartości, lub <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz uwagi.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy i zwraca identyczne kopię bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Na umowie interfejsu <xref:System.Security.IPermission>Ta wartość jest <xref:System.Security.IPermission>w sygnaturze, ale mogą być rzutowane na <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kopię bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruuje obiektu zabezpieczeń o określonym stanie kodowania XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Kodowanie XML na potrzeby rekonstrukcji obiektu zabezpieczeń.

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: elemnie ma kodowania XML dla .

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: - lub - atrybut version w elem nie jest obsługiwane.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy to <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> obejmuje określonej <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> w jego <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>listy.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: Konkretnym <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> do wyszukania.

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: Jeśli requestedAccess istnieje jako element listę bieżących .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: W przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccessma wartość null.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy i zwraca <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> czyli przecięcie bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> i określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>zaznaczono.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> do intersect z bieżącym <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nowe uprawnienia, które reprezentuje część wspólną bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> i określonego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Jest to nowe uprawnienie <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Jeśli część wspólną jest pusta.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy bieżący <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> jest podzbiorem określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>zaznaczono.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `target` jest `null` i obecnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>jest zarówno <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` i ma pustą <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>listy, ta metoda zwraca `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Uprawnienia, które ma być sprawdzane pod kątem relacji podzbioru.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli bieżący <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> jest podzbiorem określonego uprawnienia; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy to <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> Określa nieograniczone uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> Określa nieograniczone uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Jeśli <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> ma ograniczenia dotyczące poziomów dostępu określonych w <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, lub nie ma uprawnień.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy kodowania XML tego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> i jego bieżącym stanie.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Kodowanie XML tego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>, łącznie z żadnych informacji o stanie.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy uprawnienia, które jest Unii bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> i określonego uprawnienia.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Dla operatora union, intersect i logiki podzestawu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>zaznaczono najpierw i może zwrócić wyniku wyłącznie na sprawdzanie.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Następnie <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>zaznaczono.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `other` jest `null`, bieżący <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>jest zwracana.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> połączenie z bieżącym <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nowy <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> reprezentujący Unii bieżącego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> i określonego <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: other is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: otheris not or is not a .
